text: Monte Markham (born June 21, 1935) is an American movie, television, stage, radio, voice actor, movie producer, and movie director. He is known for his roles in; One Is a Lonely Number, Hot Pursuit, Jack Holborn, and in Guns of the Magnificent Seven. Markham was born on June 21, 1935 in Manatee County, Florida.Monte Markham Biography (1935-) Markham has been married to Klaire Keevil Hester since 1961. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:Movie directors from Florida Category:Movie producers from Florida Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Florida
title: Monte Markham
